entry.title: Building a better Building 20
entry.content: I LIKE the idea of being able to take something as chaotic and ill-defined as creative genius, and build a machine to produce it. There's something satisfying about the mechanisms of a machine. Each part achieves its purpose because it has...

entry.title: Blogging from within org mode
entry.content:
Just something I'm trying out. Writing a blog post from within Org-Mode. Hoping doing this will alieviate some of the 'posting anxiety' and get some stuff out there. Bebo.

entry.title: Writing up Muse presentation
entry.content: Currently writing up my presentation for the Muse / Machine Learning project. Basically I am taking data from a Muse headband, which is a consumer-grade eeg device, and putting the results through a few machine learning algorithms. It's pretty fun, if a little strenuous. Trying to find out whether...
